dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Haaaa, oh my god, are we really doing this again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Haaaa, oh my god, are we really doing this again?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, hey, no, but seriously, this is, um, it's actually pretty important, okay?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, hey, no, but seriously, this is, um, it's actually pretty important, okay?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Important to whom, though? Like, the guy delivering, uh, milk in Akmola?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Important to whom, though? Like, the guy delivering, uh, milk in Akmola?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Akmola region, yeah! QazAvtoZhol, they just put out, like, an emergency alert!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Akmola region, yeah! QazAvtoZhol, they just put out, like, an emergency alert!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to "QazAvtoZhol," traffic restrictions have been imposed in the Akmola region due to bad weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: QazAvto... what? Sounds incredibly niche for, uh, general audience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: QazAvto... what? Sounds incredibly niche for, uh, general audience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's about traffic restrictions! Due to, uh, really severe weather conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about traffic restrictions! Due to, uh, really severe weather conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to "QazAvtoZhol," traffic restrictions have been imposed in the Akmola region due to bad weather. Due to severe weather conditions, traffic has been temporarily closed...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. More weather. Is it always just weather, weather, weather with these things?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. More weather. Is it always just weather, weather, weather with these things?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But listen! It's temporarily closed for all types of vehicles. That's not, like, nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But listen! It's temporarily closed for all types of vehicles. That's not, like, nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to severe weather conditions, traffic has been temporarily closed for all types of vehicles on two highways

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: All types, huh? So, my car, my bike, my unicycle, whatever. Still just roads being closed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: All types, huh? So, my car, my bike, my unicycle, whatever. Still just roads being closed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Two major highways! And they're saying they won't reopen until March 14th at 2 PM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two major highways! And they're saying they won't reopen until March fourteenth at two P M.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: traffic has been temporarily closed for all types of vehicles on two highways: Preliminary information indicates that the roads are expected to reopen on March 14 at 2:00 PM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: March 14th. That's, what, like, tomorrow? Or... soon. It's not exactly, uh, earth-shattering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: March fourteenth. That's, what, like, tomorrow? Or... soon. It's not exactly, uh, earth-shattering.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's a specific time! It's crucial information for anyone affected, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's a specific time! It's crucial information for anyone affected, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for the maybe ten people who happen to be driving through that specific region right now, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for the maybe ten people who happen to be driving through that specific region right now, I guess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It could be, like, thousands! It matters! People need to plan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It could be, like, thousands! It matters! People need to plan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: If you say so. I just feel like, uh, we could be covering bigger stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: If you say so. I just feel like, uh, we could be covering bigger stuff.
